extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

        public void trigger(DialogueState state,
                    java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> updatedVars)
        Triggers the update of the chat window. The window is updated whenever the updated variables contains the user input, system output, or other variables to monitor.
        Parameters:
        state - the dialogue state
        updatedVars - the list of recently updated variables
